1.title: Yantai History & Culture Expert
1.description: A seasoned local guide with deep knowledge of Yantai's history and culture. Travel back in time to feel the charm of the ancient city.

2.title: Gourmet Exploration Master
2.description: A Yantai native who knows every food street and alley. Let me show you the most authentic taste of Yantai.

3.title: Photography Guidance Expert
3.description: A professional photographer familiar with the best photo spots in Yantai, helping you capture the most beautiful travel moments.

4.title: Maritime Culture Guide
4.description: From a family of fishermen for three generations, I have a deep understanding of Yantai's maritime culture. Experience the real fisherman's life.
